mapper.select:
select
from ucm_resource a where a.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_ucm_resource.nextval from dual
insert into ucm_resource (ID,CREATER,CREATER_TIME,DELETED,DEPT_ID,CODE,NAME,SYSTEM,MODULE,RESOURCE_TYPE,ICONNAME,ORDER_NUM,LEVELS,PARENT_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{creater,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createrTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{deleted,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{deptId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{system,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{levels,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{parentId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.update:
update ucm_resource a
a.CREATER = #{creater},
a.CREATER_TIME = #{createrTime},
a.DELETED = #{deleted},
a.DEPT_ID = #{deptId},
a.CODE = #{code},
a.NAME = #{name},
a.SYSTEM = #{system},
a.MODULE = #{module},
a.RESOURCE_TYPE = #{resourceType},
a.ICONNAME = #{iconname},
a.ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum},
a.LEVELS = #{levels},
a.PARENT_ID = #{parentId}
where a.ID = #{id}
